name: Format
func:
var count=msg.count count=count-1 msg.offer=msg.payload[count] msg.count=count msg.output = msg.output+"ID: "+ msg.payload[count].loanID+" NFT: "+msg.payload[count].NFT+" Amount: "+msg.payload[count].Amount+" Fee: "+msg.payload[count].Fee+" Duration: "+msg.payload[count].Time+" (s)
" return msg;

name: Count format
Format
func:
var count=msg.count count=count-1 msg.offer=msg.payload[count] msg.count=count var timeleft=msg.payload[count].Time-Date.now() timeleft=timeleft/1000 msg.output = msg.output+"ID: "+ msg.payload[count].loanID+" NFT: "+msg.payload[count].NFT+" Amount: "+msg.payload[count].Amount+" Fee: "+msg.payload[count].Fee+"
Default in: "+timeleft+" (s)
" return msg;

name: INSERT
topic: INSERT INTO TeleUsersTest(id, public, private) values(358, "WZAH51", "lK257")

func:
var public = msg.payload[0].public
var private = msg.payload[0].private
flow.set('public',public)
flow.set('private',private)
return msg;
